definitions.definition: something that is intended to be learned

examples.text: The coursebook is divided into 30 lessons.

definitions.definition: an experience, especially an unpleasant one, that somebody can learn from so that it does not happen again in the future
definitions.sensetop: lesson to somebodylesson on/about somethinglesson on/about doing somethinglesson in somethinglesson in doing somethinglesson for somebody
